sentences: Teadusmehhanismidest tuleb alustada a-st ja b-st peale.
Õpilased saavad aru füüsikast ainult kui neile seletatakse a-st ja b-st peale.
Programmeerimise põhimõisted tuleks õpetada a-st ja b-st peale.
context: The Estonian phrase 'a-st ja b-st' (literally 'from A and from B') is an idiom that means to start from the very beginning or from the most fundamental basics. It's commonly used in educational contexts when emphasizing the need to cover fundamental concepts before moving to more complex topics. The word 'asjadest' in this context appears to be a variant or related form, though the primary focus should be on understanding the idiom 'a-st ja b-st peale' which means 'starting from A and B basics'.
